hero.subtitle: Creating a New Sea for the Future
hero.description: Based on the promotion of marine industries, we contribute to the revitalization of Japan's coastal regions through diversified business development beyond the framework of fisheries. By leveraging unique technologies and partnerships with fisheries cooperatives nationwide, we realize the sustainable use of marine resources.

marine.title: Marine Business
marine.description: Diversified business development beyond the framework of fisheries. Developing innovative marine tourism through experiential fishing tourism, mobile hotels/RV parks, and partnerships with JTB Research.

seaweed.title: Mother Vegetable
seaweed.description: "The Earth's First Plant" — innovative cultivation technology by Mother Vegetables and MV Factory. With next-generation modules that grow 30 times faster, expanding into food, beauty, environment, and industry fields.

items.approval: Approved by Fisheries Agency / International Collaboration

network.title: Nationwide Network
network.description: Approximately 150,000 fisheries cooperative members and 160,000 associate members. Leveraging a network of 310,000 members to further develop the marine business.

technology.title: Unique Technology
technology.description: Through joint research with Flinders University in Australia, we have established innovative algal genome analysis technology and hold patented technology that grows algae within 24 hours.

diversity.title: Diversified Business Expansion
diversity.description: With a unique business model combining marine business, RV, and Mother Vegetable, we realize sustainable utilization of marine resources.

footer.description: Focusing on promoting marine industries, we contribute to the revitalization of Japan's coastal regions.

marinePage.title: Marine
marinePage.lead: Diversified business beyond traditional fisheries and new marine tourism leveraging RV.

biz.title: Marine Business
biz.paragraph: We develop diversified businesses beyond fisheries. We offer experiential fishing tourism at fishing ports, exchanges with local fishers, and on-site tasting of freshly caught seafood, along with environmental education programs linked to marine initiatives.

tourism.title: Experiential Fishing Tourism
tourism.desc: Planning and operating tourism experience programs utilizing fishing ports.

exchange.title: Exchange with Local Fishers
exchange.desc: Cultural exchange programs in collaboration with local fishers.

edu.title: Environmental Education Programs
edu.desc: Education and outreach on marine environmental conservation.

rv.title: RV Business
rv.paragraph: Functioning as mobile hotels, we roll out unique food and activity programs tied to marine initiatives. Night moves enable efficient trips, and fishing ports are used as RV parks to offer a unique stay experience.

hotel.title: Mobile Hotel
hotel.desc: A mobile hotel service that provides high-quality lodging experiences.

park.title: RV Park Operations
park.desc: Operation and management of RV parks utilizing fishing ports.

disaster.title: Disaster Response
disaster.desc: Providing functions as emergency evacuation facilities in disasters.

jtb.title: Partnership with JTB Research Institute
jtb.p1: We have partnered with JTB Research Institute, a leading company in Japan’s travel industry, to build a new circular tourism model themed around tourism × environment × food.
jtb.p2: This collaboration aims to create a sustainable tourism model by combining local resource utilization via the MV Factory with unique stay experiences through the RV business.

seaweedPage.title: Mother Vegetable
seaweedPage.lead: Innovative cultivation technology to enrich the world with the “first plants on Earth.”

mother.title: Mother Vegetables
mother.p1: Mother Vegetables are the so-called “first plants on Earth,” retaining their form for about 3 billion years. We select and culture roughly 2,000 types by use, developing them as materials applicable to food, beauty, environment, healthcare, and industry.

food.title: Food Sector
food.desc: Gluten-free/high-protein foods, natural colorants, dietary supplements

cosmetics.title: Cosmetics & Pharmaceuticals
cosmetics.desc: Plant-based oils, ultra-high-purity organic silica, alternative ingredients

ecosystem.title: Marine Ecosystems
ecosystem.desc: Measures against barren grounds, seaweed restoration, fish feed resources, ecosystem cycling

industry.title: Industrial Products
industry.desc: Next-generation industrial materials with zero CO₂, zero pollution, and zero human contamination

env.title: Environmental Contribution
env.desc: They grow while absorbing CO₂ via photosynthesis, producing pure, nutrient-rich yields without relying on chemical synthesis or pesticides.

forms.title: Diverse Forms
forms.desc: Offered as powder, oil, extract, filter media, and biomass, contributing to people, living things, and the planet.

factory.title: MV Factory
factory.p: A next-generation module that grows 30× faster without sunlight. MV Factory is a fully circular cultivation module designed to grow Mother Vegetables—used in food, beauty, and health—at the world’s fastest and most stable rates.

tech.title: Innovative Technology
tech.list3: Fully enclosed environment with artificial light control

locations.title: Possible Installation Sites
locations.list4: On water, deserts, and cold regions

fisheries.title: Approved by Fisheries Agency
fisheries.desc: Installation decided for Kawazu Port in Izu (approved on Apr 4, 2025)

malaysia.title: Government of Malaysia
malaysia.desc: Building an MV Factory on land equivalent to 40 Tokyo Domes

international.title: International Collaboration
international.desc: Technology partnerships with University of Malaya, National University of Singapore, and University of Nottingham

compare.title: Comparison with Conventional Mother Vegetable Cultivation

philosophy.title: Our Mission
philosophy.p1: We contribute to the development of Japan’s coastal regions through the sustainable use of marine resources. Leveraging innovative technology and a nationwide network, our mission is to pass on a rich ocean to the next generation.
philosophy.p2: From an era of competing over scarcity to one of nurturing abundance. We are building mechanisms that fulfill both people and the planet.

about.title: About Us
about.p1: Centering on promoting marine industries, we help revitalize Japan’s coastal regions.
about.p2: In fisheries, we focus on sustainable resource management and efficient harvests to ensure a stable supply of high-quality seafood. We also support technological innovation across Japan’s aquaculture and fisheries. Under the government’s “marine industry” initiative, we are developing diversified businesses that go beyond traditional fishing.
about.p3: Our marine initiatives include R&D, exchanges with local fishers, on-site tasting of freshly caught seafood, environmental education programs linked to fisheries, and activities such as dive tourism.
about.p4: Leveraging our nationwide network of sister fisheries cooperatives, we share successes and challenges and build marine business models tailored to each region. This strengthens local economies, preserves traditions, creates jobs, and advances a comprehensive vision for the future of the fisheries industry.
